Text: Kern County power plants Cc Michelle It was great to finally talk with you Here is some information on the new power plants planned in the Bakersfield area This file is a couple of years old and I quickly added in some of the latest information but some of the information here is still quite outdated However this document has some rough diagrams of the area so you can see where the projects are located The California Energy Commission has some information on their web site about these projects as well Ill talk to you soon Ben Campbell Kern County Power Plantsdoc
